text: Zisas mba bunin mbe nzua vov khaŋ mba wo phorgɨ mbɨr zav ana kamgi guma ga nzuai, “Ndu shama bakɨmen muuŋv wo phorgɨ mbɨr saŋv, ndu won kɨvntogira kamɨv, won fek gu tarira kamɨv, won ŋgun ŋkɨɨa vhɨrve ki gumgi, ndu mbera kamɨ thari. Ndu maaŋ muuŋgirga, mbe zumgum ndura kamgirga, ndu ŋgɨp mbe phorgɨ mbɨrim, mbe ndu shama ŋgarkararga.
